name: coin3d

variants.name: html
variants.description: Build and install Coin HTML documentation

variants.name: man
variants.description: Build and install Coin man pages

variants.name: framework
variants.description: Do 'UNIX-style' installation on Mac OS X

variants.name: shared
variants.description: Build shared library (off: build static library)

description:
Coin is an OpenGL-based, 3D graphics library that has its roots in the
Open Inventor 2.1 API, which Coin still is compatible with.

dependencies.name: boost
dependencies.description:
Boost provides free peer-reviewed portable C++ source libraries,
emphasizing libraries that work well with the C++ Standard Library.
Boost libraries are intended to be widely useful, and usable across a
broad spectrum of applications. The Boost license encourages both
commercial and non-commercial use.

dependencies.name: doxygen
dependencies.description:
Doxygen is the de facto standard tool for generating documentation from
annotated C++ sources, but it also supports other popular programming
languages such as C, Objective-C, C#, PHP, Java, Python, IDL (Corba,
Microsoft, and UNO/OpenOffice flavors), Fortran, VHDL, Tcl, and to some
extent D..

dependencies.name: perl
dependencies.description:
Perl 5 is a highly capable, feature-rich programming language with over
27 years of development.

dependencies.name: glu
dependencies.description: This package provides the Mesa OpenGL Utility library.

dependencies.name: gl
dependencies.description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.

dependencies.name: libxext
dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.

dependencies.name: libxcb
dependencies.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.

dependencies.name: libxau
dependencies.description:
The libXau package contains a library implementing the X11 Authorization
Protocol. This is useful for restricting client access to the display.
